
## What's Next After SPM? 

#### Congratulations on completing your SPM!!! 

Now that it's time to continue your education journey, it is really important that you make the right choice on which tertiary education to enrol in. If you are interested in pursuing a higher education in local universities but still unsure on which one or how to do so, worry not as <b>U-Beginner</b> is a great platform created to guide you throughout the process.

## About this application
<h4><i class="fa fa-sitemap"></i><b>Pathway Overview</b></h4>
Not sure where to start? Feel free to refer to our flow chart and all the confusion will be answered. 

<h4><i class="fa fa-list-alt"></i><b>Institutions Finder</b></h4>
Visit our Institution Finder to find the list of institutions available for your desired course.

<h4><i class="fa fa-table"></i><b>World Ranking</b></h4>
The ranking of universities can also play a big part in making your decision, therefore if you wish to seek for it, we have it covered in the World Ranking.
